metadata.title: CVE-2024-57918 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: fix page fault due to max surface definition mismatchDC driver is using two different values to define the maximum number ofsurfaces: MAX_SURFACES and MAX_SURFACE_NUM.
